replies.body: Is it coming this week or the next ¿
This week
Let me guess: fairly soon?
Soonish
nvr
So today or tomorrow? :D
Reeeeeeeee~~av3~~

Honest thing Malicious, I hope you get a tease for Mord.
Or at least, if it isn't mord yet, that we get Pantheon in there because he is the only one I feel could go before "number second in metal fight me" Mordekaiser.
Can't wait for the colorful marksmen that steals your auto attacks /s
Lol. Don't worry we don't have anymore champs in development that steal anything for anyone :P
What about stealing enemy champion souls?!
Enslaving is different then stealing

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=J8tOzbOu,comment-id=000600000007000000000001,timestamp=2019-01-24T00:03:56.526+0000)
>
> Enslaving is different then stealing

https://pm1.narvii.com/5841/d71c0f828da4ccc479a2435126db0632b6fcea2f_hq.jpg
Unleash the bear !! Its what Volibear does best stealing souls !

Im pretty sure it will be close between Morde and him for the next VGU. Morde is probaly more due for it then Voli but I think with all the Marvel Comics based in Freljord, it is a good setup for armoured bear !
Am I the only one who feels like Shaco should definitely be very high priority as well?

His kit doesn't seem as outdated as the kits of some other champs on the list like Mordekaiser, Dr. Mundo, Volibear and so on.
So I don't really consider him a top priority candidate for now.

I would never put him over Mordekaiser or Pantheon, but he seems in dire need of work to me.  His art is terribly outdated, his lore is messed up and his gameplay is very boring and not interactive. " It has some unique traits like the jack in the box or the exploding clone, but IMO he has Mordekaiser level potential if they explore him further.

Absolutely not, he's one of my personal most wanted.  But I don't think he'll be any time soon because they don't talk about him that often.
His art is pretty awful.

hopefully today, thursday at the latest*

*just my speculation
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/478622490932019202/537303258985791532/Bildschirmfoto_2019-01-22_um_17.11.05.png
If it's actually Volibear and not Mordekaiser I'm gonna be salty. Time to pray.

I'm concerned about the Mordekaiser VGU. Swain is still a sore point for me. If he gets Aatrox-tier memeshit interactions so help me.

I wonder what they've done to Kayle and Morgana. Hopefully their conflict will be handled with _finesse_.

> [{quoted}](name=Tharizdûn,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=J8tOzbOu,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-01-22T16:16:31.149+0000)
>
> I'm concerned about the Mordekaiser VGU. Swain is still a sore point for me. If he gets Aatrox-tier memeshit interactions so help me.
> 
> I wonder what they've done to Kayle and Morgana. Hopefully their conflict will be handled with _finesse_.

If Morde gets a Swain type of VGU it will be so good! Swain was by far the best rework/new champ of last year.
Can't say I agree since {{champion:20}} happened, but I too loved Swain!

> [{quoted}](name=Tharizdûn,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=J8tOzbOu,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-01-22T16:16:31.149+0000)
>
> I'm concerned about the Mordekaiser VGU. Swain is still a sore point for me. If he gets Aatrox-tier memeshit interactions so help me.
> 
> However, I'm looking forward to Kayle & Morgana. _Hopefully_ their conflict will be handled with sub-tle-ty.

Why was Swain a "sore point" for you ¿
Hm. It probably has something to do with the long hair, younger face, radical gameplay changes, and no transformation ultimate.

I’m still do not like his new visuals. I wake in the middle of the night and this post still haunts. 

https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/champion-reveal-swain

The comments compare him to Lucius Malfoy is branded in my memories and they will not leave.

What gets me is, if they wanted to use Jason Isaacs as their face model, couldn't they have gone with him when he played the part of an actual military genius: 
https://cdn-static.denofgeek.com/sites/denofgeek/files/2017/10/isaacs_6.jpg
I didn't expect to see a Death of Stalin reference on the boards
It's a good movie, and he was hilarious in that role.  Stole every scene.
Agreed, loved it, Buscemi nailed Khrushchev and Malenkov and Beria were great too
Swain to me was perfect. Aatrox was the textbook definition of failure. I agree, Morde should not have joke interactions.
I think it will be unevitable that he has some joke interactions. Mordekaiser became way too much of a meme to not do this.

> [{quoted}](name=SatomiKun,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=J8tOzbOu,comment-id=000300020000,timestamp=2019-01-24T05:51:01.611+0000)
>
> I think it will be unevitable that he has some joke interactions. Mordekaiser became way too much of a meme to not do this.

he needs at least some bug memes/jokes and I say this as a huege fan of Morde and his lore

Exactly.
For example, his joke animation could be bugs coming out of his armor and he tries to stomp them or anything.

Nothing wrong with making a serious character a bit funny. Urgot is pretty serious, yet he still pulls out a rubberducky from his belly for his joke. Or how he dances the cancan.
#Roadmap Hype!
_***~~Roadmap hype!~~***_
Im hyped, because of the post, but I have no idea whats happening. Whats roadmap? and why are we so excited for it?

The Roadmap tells us about the future Reworks and new Champions.
We will get more info on the Kayle and Morgana Reworks and hopefully some teasers for new champions.

> [{quoted}](name=Lordredstonenr1,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=J8tOzbOu,comment-id=00100000,timestamp=2019-01-22T18:58:21.441+0000)
>
> The Roadmap tells us about the future Reworks and new Champions.
> We will get more info on the Kayle and Morgana Reworks and hopefully some teasers for new champions.

oh cool cool, and its hopefully going to come out this week? nice! I hope they touch some of the older champions
_***~~Confirmed this week!~~***_
Pls make it so Morde is first on the roadmap.
Malicious Metal still hoping for the Morde VGU announcement
Last man standin'
I can't wait for all the "Morde mains since s1" to come out and complain about his rework.
Well, there are already people panicking over on the Morde mains reddit, saying he doesn't need a rework so you can bet that there's going to be even more of that comin' our way.
Please. Ha
